articles.title: BBC bans white people from applying for new job - Newshub
articles.description: The position is only open to 'Black, Asian and ethnically diverse candidates.'
articles.content:
A discrimination row has broken out in the UK, after the BBC advertised a new trainee position job, but no white people could go for it.

articles.title: Europe starts building up electric car battery capacity - manilastandard.net
articles.description: PARIS―As electric car sales soar, Europe has started to build up its capacity to produce batteries on the continent but it remains far from reducing its dependence on Asia.
